column4: When I boot up my Ubuntu box I get a Grub error 22, anyone know how to resolve that? I ran the grub recovery with no resolve then ran fixmbr from a windows cd now I dont even get a grub error!
When I boot up my Ubuntu box I get a Grub error 22, anyone know how to resolve that? I ran the grub recovery with no resolve then ran fixmbr from a windows cd now I dont even get a grub error!
